history.proof: intros pl0 pl1 H. unfold pl_compatible in H. destruct H as [n' [H0 H1]]. exists n'. split. apply H1. apply H0.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall pl0 pl1 : prec_list, pl_compatible pl0 pl1 -> pl_compatible pl1 pl0

Premises:
Inductive prec_list : Set := prec_cons : ad -> prec_list -> prec_list -> prec_list | prec_empty : prec_list
pl_compatible = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => exists n : nat, pl_tl_length pl0 n /\ pl_tl_length pl1 n : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop
pl_compat_sym : forall pl0 pl1 : prec_list, pl_compat pl0 pl1 -> pl_compat pl1 pl0
st_compatible = fun s0 s1 : state => forall (c : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s0 c = Some pl0 -> MapGet prec_list s1 c = Some pl1 -> pl_compatible pl0 pl1 : state -> state -> Prop
pl_compat = fun pl0 pl1 : prec_list => pl0 = prec_empty /\ pl1 = prec_empty \/ pl0 <> prec_empty /\ pl1 <> prec_empty : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop
prec_occur_ind : forall P : prec_list -> ad -> Prop, (forall (a : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), P (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) a) -> (forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl0 b -> P pl0 b -> P (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b) -> (forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl1 b -> P pl1 b -> P (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b) -> forall (p : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_occur p a -> P p a
Inductive prec_occur : prec_list -> ad -> Prop := prec_hd : forall (a : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) a | prec_int0 : forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl0 b -> prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b | prec_int1 : forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl1 b -> prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b
prec_int1 : forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl1 b -> prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b
prec_int0 : forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl0 b -> prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b
mpl_compat_0 : forall (c : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list c pl0) (M1 prec_list c pl1) -> pl_compat pl0 pl1
prec_hd : forall (a : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) a
prec_list_rec : forall P : prec_list -> Set, (forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), P p -> forall p0 : prec_list, P p0 -> P (prec_cons a p p0)) -> P prec_empty -> forall p : prec_list, P p
prec_list_ind : forall P : prec_list -> Prop, (forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), P p -> forall p0 : prec_list, P p0 -> P (prec_cons a p p0)) -> P prec_empty -> forall p : prec_list, P p
prec_list_rect : forall P : prec_list -> Type, (forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), P p -> forall p0 : prec_list, P p0 -> P (prec_cons a p p0)) -> P prec_empty -> forall p : prec_list, P p
pl_tl_length_rec_0 = fun (d : preDTA) (pl : prec_list) (tl : term_list) (H : pl_tl_length pl 0) (H0 : liste_reconnait d pl tl) => let H1 : pl = pl -> 0 = 0 -> 0 = lst_length tl := match H in (pl_tl_length p n) return (p = pl -> n = 0 -> 0 = lst_length tl) with | pl_tl_O => fun (H1 : prec_empty = pl) (H2 : 0 = 0) => (fun H3 : prec_empty = pl => let H4 : prec_empty = pl := H3 in eq_ind prec_empty (fun _ : prec_list => 0 = 0 -> 0 = lst_length tl) (fun _ : 0 = 0 => let H6 : liste_reconnait d prec_empty tl := eq_ind_r (fun pl0 : prec_list => liste_reconnait d pl0 tl) H0 H3 in let H7 : d = d -> prec_empty = prec_empty -> tl = tl -> 0 = lst_length tl...
borne_0_0 : forall p : prec_list, prec_in_state (M0 prec_list) p -> taille_0 p <= taille_1 (M0 prec_list)
prec_contained_ind : forall P : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop, (forall p : prec_list, P p p) -> (forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p0 -> P p p0 -> P p (prec_cons a p0 p1)) -> (forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p1 -> P p p1 -> P p (prec_cons a p0 p1)) -> forall p p0 : prec_list, prec_contained p p0 -> P p p0
prec_id : forall p : prec_list, prec_contained p p
prec_in_state_M0_false : forall p : prec_list, ~ prec_in_state (M0 prec_list) p
Inductive prec_contained : prec_list -> prec_list -> Prop := prec_id : forall p : prec_list, prec_contained p p | prec_c_int0 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p0 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1) | prec_c_int1 : forall (p p0 p1 : prec_list) (a : ad), prec_contained p p1 -> prec_contained p (prec_cons a p0 p1)
invar_1_1 : forall (d : preDTA) (a c : ad) (t : term_list) (n : nat), rec_term d a (app c t) (S n) = true -> exists p : prec_list, rec_list_terms d p t n = true
semantic_equiv_0_4 : forall (d : preDTA) (a a' : ad) (l : term_list) (n : nat) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> rec_term d a (app a' l) (S n) = true -> exists p : prec_list, MapGet prec_list s a' = Some p
pl_sum : forall pl : prec_list, pl = prec_empty \/ (exists (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list), pl = prec_cons a la ls)
Z.le_ind : forall A : Z -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq iff) A -> forall n : Z, A n -> (forall m : Z, (n <= m)%Z -> A m -> A (Z.succ m)) -> forall m : Z, (n <= m)%Z -> A m
Pos.peano_rect : forall P : positive -> Type, P 1%positive -> (forall p : positive, P p -> P (Pos.succ p)) -> forall p : positive, P p
Pos.peano_ind : forall P : positive -> Prop, P 1%positive -> (forall p : positive, P p -> P (Pos.succ p)) -> forall p : positive, P p
N_ind : forall P : N -> Prop, P 0%N -> (forall p : positive, P (N.pos p)) -> forall n : N, P n
term_list_ind : forall P : term_list -> Prop, P tnil -> (forall (t : term) (t0 : term_list), P t0 -> P (tcons t t0)) -> forall t : term_list, P t
Map_rect : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Type), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
Map_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : Map A -> Prop), P (M0 A) -> (forall (a : ad) (a0 : A), P (M1 A a a0)) -> (forall m : Map A, P m -> forall m0 : Map A, P m0 -> P (M2 A m m0)) -> forall m : Map A, P m
ltof : forall A : Type, (A -> nat) -> A -> A -> Prop
Z.bi_induction : forall P : Z -> Prop, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful Z.eq iff) P -> P 0%Z -> (forall x : Z, P x <-> P (Z.succ x)) -> forall z : Z, P z
MapPut1 : forall A : Type, ad -> A -> ad -> A -> positive -> Map A
MapPut : forall A : Type, Map A -> ad -> A -> Map A
M1 : forall A : Type, ad -> A -> Map A
MapGet : forall A : Type, Map A -> ad -> option A
state_reconnait_ind : forall P : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop, (forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> P d s (app c tl)) -> forall (p : preDTA) (s : state) (t : term), state_reconnait p s t -> P p s t
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop := rec_empty : forall d : preDTA, liste_reconnait d prec_empty tnil | rec_consi : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd ->...-> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
M2 : forall A : Type, Map A -> Map A -> Map A
pl_tl_length_ind : forall P : prec_list -> nat -> Prop, P prec_empty 0 -> (forall (a : ad) (pl : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length pl n -> P pl n -> P (prec_cons a pl prec_empty) (S n)) -> (forall (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length la n -> P la n -> pl_tl_length ls (S n) -> P ls (S n) -> P (prec_cons a la ls) (S n)) -> forall (p : prec_list) (n : nat), pl_tl_length p n -> P p n
Eqdep_dec.inj_right_pair_on : forall (A : Type) (x : A), (forall y : A, x = y \/ x <> y) -> forall (P : A -> Prop) (y y' : P x), ex_intro P x y = ex_intro P x y' -> y = y'
MapCard : forall A : Type, Map A -> nat

```  
intros pl0 pl1 H.
unfold pl_compatible in H.
intros n. destruct H as [n' [H0 H1]].
exists n'. split. apply H1. apply H0.
```
